title: Antoine Griezmann
summary: Antoine Griezmann (French pronunciation: ​[ɑ̃twan ɡʁijɛzman];[4] born 21 March 1991) is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for La Liga club Atlético Madrid, on loan from Barcelona, and the France national team. A versatile player, Griezmann is known for his attacking, passing and also supportive defence, and has played as an attacking midfielder, winger and striker in his career.
